name: 2ButtonsAdventure
description:
2ButtonsAdventure is a game made for the LudumDare34 with theme "2 Buttons Controls" #LDJAM

Controls

Clic on buttons or use Left & Right arrow for actions

R for reset the game

M for mute the music

Escape for quit the game

Play on Windows/OSX/Linux version for a better experience.

More infos and rate here

My Twitter : @Zyow

Music by Sei Mutsuki
